trans-unit.target: TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> Sveinn has discovered something unusual in the delivery brought from the mine.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_TODO_00<tab>Show the cat's-eye charm to the graveyard keeper.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_TODO_01<tab>Give the cat's-eye charm to the one-eyed miner.

TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SVEINN_000_000<tab>Have you seen a charm like this before? I found it among the stones brought from the mine. A lot of the workers wear these for good luck, and I expect whoever lost it is wondering where it went.

TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SVEINN_000_001<tab>It's the first time I've seen one made from cat's-eye, so the owner shouldn't be hard to track down. I'd go and look for them myself, but I've got too much to do here.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SVEINN_000_002<tab>Would you be able to go in my place? The graveyard keeper is quite knowledgeable about charms and whatnot, so it might be worth asking him.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SVEINN_000_010<tab>I can't very well keep it for myself or sell it. For all I know, it could be cursed or something!

TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_PRIEST03511_000_021<tab>Oh, yes. Cat's-eye charms like this were once used to ward off misfortune. The tradition began with the Church of the First Light and the gem represents their patron deity.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_PRIEST03511_000_022<tab>Even though no one follows that old religion anymore, some of its customs remain, especially among the miners.

TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_PRIEST03511_000_023<tab>You don't see many this exquisite, though. I seem to remember the fellow with an eyepatch kept a similar charm around his neck. It might even be the exact same one.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_PRIEST03511_000_024<tab>I never caught his name, but he's not hard to miss. The last I saw of him, he was leaving to mine Nuvy's Leavings with some of the others.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_SVEINN_000_030<tab>Man with an eyepatch? Yes, I know the one. So you think the charm might be his?
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_PRIEST03511_000_031<tab>I can't say for certain if the man I mentioned is the owner. I have a feeling I saw him wearing that charm, though.
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_MINER03511_000_040<tab>Oh, I didn't notice you there. What do you want?
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_MINER03511_000_042<tab>Gods! How could I have been so careless!
TEXT_LUCKZH001_03511_MINER03511_000_043<tab>This was all my sister left behind before she... Look, I'd rather not talk about it. But I appreciate you bringing this back to me. It means a lot.
